content: Adds a --create-scenario CLI flag that launches an interactive wizard using @inquirer/prompts. The wizard loops through pattern/message input prompts with a confirm to continue, then outputs a valid ScenarioFile JSON to stdout. The flag is mutually exclusive with -p and --scenario. Changes span argument parsing (args.ts), a new create-scenario module with dependency-injected prompt functions, wiring in index.ts, and corresponding unit and CLI integration tests.
